mainSequence.step: PlayerA sends a POST battle request to BattleController
BattleController forwards the request to BattleService
BattleService retrieves open battles from BattleRepository
BattleService opens a battle for PlayerA
BattleService waits for the battle to start
PlayerB sends a POST battle request to BattleController
BattleController forwards the request to BattleService
BattleService retrieves open battles from BattleRepository
BattleService initiates the battle between PlayerA and PlayerB using BattleLogic
BattleService updates the battle status in BattleRepository
BattleService sends the battle results to BattleController
BattleController forwards the battle results to PlayerA
BattleController forwards the battle results to PlayerB
